name: Very Epic Taverner
description:
Very Epic Taverner

This is a medieval innkeeper simulator game that allows players to experience what it would be like to run and manage a medieval inn. Players take on the role of the innkeeper and are responsible for tasks such as managing finances, hiring staff, stocking inventory, preparing food and drinks, accommodating guests, and maintaining the inn's facilities.

This particular game is submitted as a component of my academic project for our university course "Game Console Integration".

 CONTROLS 
  • ARROWS = movement (hold Shift to sprint)
  • SPACEBAR = interact
  • 0 = cancel / back / menu
  • LEFT CLICK = movement
  • RIGHT CLICK = cancel / back / menu
